@oobe-protocol-labs/synapse-client-sdk
  • @oobe-protocol-labs/synapse-client-sdk
  • WsClient

Class WsClient

Typed Solana WebSocket subscription client.

Supports accountSubscribe, programSubscribe, logsSubscribe, signatureSubscribe, slotSubscribe, and rootSubscribe.

Works in both browser and Node.js environments.

Since

1.0.0

  • Defined in packages/synapse-client-sdk/src/websocket/client.ts:97

  • close(): void

  • Close the WebSocket connection and clear all subscriptions. Disables auto-reconnect.

    Returns void

onAccountChange

  • onAccountChange(pubkey, handler, opts?): number

  • Subscribe to changes on a specific account.

    Parameters

    • pubkey: never

      Account public key to watch.

    • handler: ((n: AccountNotification) => void)

      Callback invoked on every account change.

        • (n): void

        • Parameters

          • n: AccountNotification

          Returns void

    • opts: AccountSubParams = {}

      Encoding and commitment options.

    Returns number

    Local subscription ID (use with unsubscribe).

    Since

    1.0.0

    • Defined in packages/synapse-client-sdk/src/websocket/client.ts:129

onLogs

  • onLogs(filter, handler, opts?): number

  • Subscribe to transaction logs.

    Parameters

    • filter: LogsFilter

      'all', 'allWithVotes', or { mentions: [pubkey] }.

    • handler: ((n: LogsNotification) => void)

      Callback invoked with signature + log lines.

        • (n): void

        • Parameters

          • n: LogsNotification

          Returns void

    • opts: LogsSubParams = {}

      Commitment options.

    Returns number

    Local subscription ID.

    Since

    1.0.0

    • Defined in packages/synapse-client-sdk/src/websocket/client.ts:155

onProgramAccountChange

  • onProgramAccountChange(programId, handler, opts?): number

  • Subscribe to changes on all accounts owned by a program.

    Parameters

    • handler: ((n: ProgramNotification) => void)

          Returns void

    Returns number

    Local subscription ID.

  • Subscribe to a specific transaction signature's confirmation.

    Parameters

      Transaction signature to watch.

    • handler: ((n: SignatureNotification) => void)
